Text:
The story begins when a bus driver finds a dead girl lying in the bus. He and the bus owner hurriedly arrange to hide her body and plan to leave the dead body somewhere along the bus route. Soon, the mayhem befalls as the dead girl returns as a furious ghost and scares off all the passengers.


Title: 3 Yaan
Director: Ping Lumprapleng, Yuthlert Sippapak, Kohtee Aramboy
Starring: Kiatisak âSena Hoyâ Udomnak, Kohtee Aramboy, Pong Lang Sa Orn
Website: www.filmrusworld.com/3yan
Release Date in Thailand: 20 May 2010
